Title: Imaginary Enemies
Plot: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Madeline Brewer, Danielle Brooks, Lea DeLaria, Joel Marsh Garland, Vicky Jeudy, Natasha Lyonne, James McDaniel, Matt Peters, Nick Sandow, Samira Wiley
